question: Every evening, Vancouverites hear the boom of the Nine o’clock gun, an english cannon that was installed in Stanley Park in 1894. What was its original purpose?

option.1: To remind locals of the park’s nightly closing
option.2: To honor fishermen who died at sea
option.3: To remember British naval captain George Vancouver
